00473 {
00474         Assembly* parent = m_parent;
00475         
00476         //while parent exists and type is not ROOT,
00477         // move upwards and head for selected container

00479         {

00482         
00483         //return true, if parent type = selected

clone of generic assembly

Assembly* pointer to assembly

00109

00111         {
00112                 //if assembly is original, set origin pointer
00113                 m_clone->m_origin = this;
00114         }

00117                 //else set same origin, is clone from clone

00156                 }

Assembly * Assembly::getHashOriginal ( const wxString &  hash  )  const

find original object for hash string and return null or pointer

Returns:
Assembly* pointer to original

Definition at line 1172 of file Assembly.cpp.

01173 {
01174         //search for the same hash and return
01175         for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
01176         {
01177                 if (!(*it)->isOriginal())
01178                 {
01179                         continue;
01180                 }
01181                 if (!(*it)->isType(IS_OBJECT))
01182                 {
01183                         continue;
01184                 }
01185                 if (hash == (*it)->getHash())
01186                 {
01187                         return (*it);
01188                 }
01189         }
01190         return NULL;
01191 }

void Assembly::draw (  ) 

draw this assembly and all his children and push ID to glLoadName, if its atomic

Definition at line 1027 of file Assembly.cpp.

01028 {
01029         //if hidden, abort draw
01030         if (!m_visible)
01031         {
01032                 return;
01033         }
01034         
01035         //start drawing glow colors on selection
01036         if (m_type == IS_ATOMIC)
01037         {
01038                 //if its an atomic part, set name
01039                 glLoadName((int)this);
01040         }
01041         else if (m_parent != NULL)
01042         {
01043                 float glowcolor[4] = {0.0,0.0,0.0,0.0};
01044                 
01045                 //if selected paint in different colors
01046                 if (m_parent->m_type == IS_SELECTED)
01047                 {
01048                         if (m_type != IS_GROUP)
01049                         {
01050                                 //paint blue glowing
01051                                 glowcolor[0] = 0.0;
01052                                 glowcolor[1] = 0.0;
01053                                 glowcolor[2] = 1.0;
01054                                 glowcolor[3] = 1.0;
01055                         }
01056                         
01057                         if (m_type == IS_GROUP)
01058                         {
01059                                 //paint blue glowing
01060                                 glowcolor[0] = 1.0;
01061                                 glowcolor[1] = 0.0;
01062                                 glowcolor[2] = 0.0;
01063                                 glowcolor[3] = 1.0;
01064                         }
01065                         
01066                         //if parent type group or selected, draw square on floor
01067                         if (glowcolor[3] > 0.0)
01068                         {
01069                                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, glowcolor);
01070                                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_AMBIENT, glowcolor);
01071                         }
01072                 }
01073                 else if (m_parent->m_type == IS_ROOT)
01074                 {
01075                         //reset glow value for objects in root
01076                         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, glowcolor);
01077                         glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_AMBIENT, glowcolor);
01078                 }
01079         }
01080         
01081         glPushMatrix();
01082         {
01083                 //first translate to position
01084                 glTranslatef(m_x, m_y, m_z);
01085                 
01086                 //rotate in object center
01087                 glRotatef(m_phi, 1, 0, 0);
01088                 glRotatef(m_theta, 0, 1, 0);
01089                 glRotatef(m_rho, 0, 0, 1);
01090                 
01091                 //finally scale on place
01092                 glScalef(m_scale_x, m_scale_y, m_scale_z);
01093                 
01094                 if (glIsList(m_dl_object))
01095                 {
01096                         //call display list of objects
01097                         glCallList(m_dl_object);
01098                 }
01099                 else
01100                 {
01101                         //create new display list for myself
01102                         m_dl_object = glGenLists(1);
01103                         
01104                         //setup new display list
01105                         glNewList(m_dl_object,GL_COMPILE);
01106                         {
01107                                 // draw myself to display list
01108                                 for (list<Face>::const_iterator it = m_face.begin(); it != m_face.end(); ++it)
01109                                 {
01110                                         it->draw();
01111                                 }
01112                         }
01113                         glEndList();
01114                 }
01115                 
01116                 // draw the children
01117                 for (list<Assembly*>::const_iterator it = m_part.begin(); it != m_part.end(); ++it)
01118                 {
01119                         // set Child-Material
01120                         map<const Assembly* const, Material>::iterator it_mat = m_child_mat.find(*it);
01121                         if (it_mat != m_child_mat.end())
01122                         {
01123                                 it_mat->second.set();
01124                         }
01125                         
01126                         // draw the Child
01127                         (*it)->draw();
01128                 }
01129         }
01130         glPopMatrix();
01131 }
